Additionally, programming proficiency in Java and Python, particularly in the context of machine learning. This combination of front- end development, version control, and machine learning skills showcases a well- rounded and adaptable developer capable of tackling diverse projects across both web development and advanced programming domains.

projects.description: Preprocessed the text data using NLP techniques like removing stop words. Converted the text into vector form using TfIdf vectorizer. Fit this data to the Nave Bayes algorithm. Created the user interface using Streamlit for this project.

Created visualizations to communicate insights and support decisions on aircraft performance and fare strategies.
